column4: i am getting this error when i try to restart my network after adding in ipv6 static addresses root@Pandora-Eywa:~# /etc/init.d/networking restart    * Reconfiguring network interfaces...   SIOCADDRT: File exists   Failed to bring up eth0.

i am getting this error when i try to restart my network after adding in ipv6 static addresses root@Pandora-Eywa:~# /etc/init.d/networking restart    * Reconfiguring network interfaces...   SIOCADDRT: File exists   Failed to bring up eth0.  what am i doing wrong
sudo apt-get update to get the current versions, then apt-get upgrade to update the packages
